longest_stay_room.question_template: In which room did the observer stay for the longest time among {state1} and {state2}?

shortest_stay_room.question_template: In which room did the observer stay for the shortest time among {state1} and {state2}?

cross_state_longest_room_comparison.question_template: Among the following options, which state-room combination had the longest observation time?

cross_state_shortest_room_comparison.question_template: Among the following options, which state-room combination had the shortest observation time?

room_visit_count_comparison.question_template: Which room was visited more times in {state1} compared to {state2}?

total_room_visits.question_template: How many times did the observer visit {room} in total across {state1} and {state2}?

object_observation_comparison.question_template: Which object was observed for a longer total time across {state1} and {state2}?

rooms_visited_both_states.question_template: Which rooms were visited in both {state1} and {state2}?

rooms_visited_only_state1.question_template: Which rooms were visited only in {state1} but not in {state2}?

rooms_visited_only_state2.question_template: Which rooms were visited only in {state2} but not in {state1}?

nth_mth_visit_room_type.question_template: Do the {visit1_order} visited room in the {state1} video and the {visit2_order} visited room in the {state2} video have the same type? If not, what are their respective types?

nth_mth_visit_room_shape.question_template: Do the {visit1_order} visited room in the {state1} video and the {visit2_order} visited room in the {state2} video have the same shape? If not, what are their respective shapes?

nth_mth_visit_room_size.question_template: Which room has a larger area: the {visit1_order} visited room in the {state1} video or the {visit2_order} visited room in the {state2} video? And approximately what percentage larger is it?

nth_mth_visit_room_same.question_template: Are the {visit1_order} visited room in the {state1} video and the {visit2_order} visited room in the {state2} video the same room?
